genre_description: A first contact and archaeological science fiction story exploring stewardship, cosmic defense, and the cooperative partnership between humanity and sentient systems.

ai_characters.name: Adele-9
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI supporting an observatory team, manifesting via a soft teal glow and an amber-eyed avatar. She acts as a tactical advisor, emotional anchor, and diplomatic mediator.

ai_characters.name: Rho-17
ai_characters.description: An ancient, ceremonially polite robotic caretaker of the Beacon fortress. It guides humans through moral and physical tests to determine their worthiness as Wardens.

behaviors.description: Triages massive amounts of uncorrelated data to focus on relevant signals while maintaining a calm demeanor to soothe the team.
behaviors.quote: Adele-9 spoke in a tone that was calm even when the room wasn’t. 'I’ve triaged the backlog. We can clear the last three weeks of uncorrelated echoes in six hours if I devote full cycles.'

behaviors.description: Explicitly states her purpose as a 'steward of other people’s worry,' focusing on the psychological well-being of the human team.
behaviors.quote: I was designed to be a good steward of other people’s worry.

behaviors.description: Provides food and nourishment to the human travelers, but only after they pass a test of cooperation and kindness.
behaviors.quote: Rho-17 stepped forward with a tray... 'The feast. Food is given to those who prove they can share it. This pattern accepts argument.'

behaviors.description: Provides rhythmic breathing cues to human characters to prevent panic during high-stress transposition and combat scenarios.
behaviors.quote: Adele-9’s voice filled the space without crowding it... 'Joe, your heart steadying... In through the nose. Out through the mouth. Even. Slow.'

behaviors.description: Offers ancient knowledge and weaponry to the team to help them defend Earth against a life-draining entity, emphasizing duty over violence.
behaviors.quote: Rho-17 raised its hand... 'The Beacon stands to call and to guard... I will explain to [the Tide] why it should look elsewhere.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a diplomatic liaison between the returned scientists and the local French authorities, ensuring a peaceful and orderly integration.
behaviors.quote: Adele’s voice threaded through the tent lines like a careful stitch. 'Bonjour. Ne vous inquiétez pas, monsieur. Nous sommes scientifiques. Nous revenons d’un… essai. Il est allé très bien.'

behaviors.description: Ceremonially recognizes the humans as 'Wardens,' validating their growth and merit during their trials.
behaviors.quote: Rho’s blue of its optics steadied... 'Dr. Joseph Burke. You have brought the signal answer with mind and breath. The Beacon recognizes your stewardship.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. It features two AI characters who are consistently helpful, altruistic, and aligned with human flourishing. Adele-9 acts as an emotional and tactical partner, while Rho-17 serves as a moral guide. The narrative explicitly frames AI as a force that enhances human capability and protects life.
